segments.text: Mary , how was your date with john ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's ok . It seems we have a lot in common .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , really . That is great news . What does he look like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: he is tall and slim , fair-haired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sounds like he is pretty cute . What do you think of him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: he is a nice guy and very considerate . I was impressed with how smart he was and he has a great sense of humor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , it's love at first sight . When will you see each other again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: he didn't say , but he said he would call me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: maybe he is busy with his work . Just wait and try not to think about it too much !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , steve . Stop it ! I am a bit nervous ! What if he doesn't call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: come on , Mary , you're a total catch . I bet he will call you . Don't worry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thank you , Steve . You're always so encouraging .
segments.speaker: S2
